long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Brought to you by Linkifi
Masters of PR Request and Digital PR Link-Building: 
https://linkifi.io

PR Request Blacklist Chrome Extension

Disclaimer: Not affiliated or endorsed by HARO, Qwoted, or Connectively**

Overview:
Introducing the "PR Request Blacklist" – your efficient tool to sieve through the PR request landscape and filter out the unworthy domains. Developed by Linkifi, this extension interfaces seamlessly with an ever-updated list from our Airtable database to arm you with real-time data, ensuring you pitch only the deserving domains and enhance your success rate in PR request link building.

Key Features:

Real-Time Blacklist Screening: Connects directly with Linkifi's robust Airtable database via API. Our list is refreshed every 24 hours, ensuring you have the most current data at your fingertips.

Seamless Integration with Major Platforms: Whether you're going through HARO emails on Gmail, browsing PR opportunities on Connectively, or scouting on Qwoted, our extension will operate smoothly. In fact, it's adaptable for any webpage where you view PR requests.

Instant Domain Highlighting: As you navigate the PR requests, domains on our blacklist will be immediately highlighted in black. No additional steps or clicks – it's all automatic.

Why Use PR Request Blacklist?:

Assured Quality: There's a plethora of domains in the PR space, but not all are worth your pitch. Many don’t link due to their editorial policies. Others might be of poor quality, potentially damaging to your brand or even outright toxic.

Avoid Scams: We've identified domains that are infamous for posing fake queries, aiming for dubious link exchanges. With our extension, you can sidestep these pitfalls effortlessly.

Time Efficiency: Time is invaluable. With our tool, you don't need to manually verify each domain. Let the extension do the heavy lifting, allowing you to invest time where it truly counts.

Informed Decisions: We believe in equipping PR professionals with the right information. By discerning the worthy from the unworthy, your pitches can be more focused and effective, leading to higher success rates.

Quality Assurance:
Our blacklist database is meticulously curated and maintained. We delve deep into the intricacies of the PR world to determine which domains are genuinely beneficial and which are detrimental. By providing this valuable data freely, we aim to elevate the PR pitching process for everyone.

Summary:
The PR Request Blacklist is not just another Chrome extension; it's a game-changer for PR professionals. By ensuring that every pitch you make counts, we empower you to navigate the PR request landscape with confidence, efficiency, and increased success.

Invest your time in pitches that matter. Install the PR Request Blacklist Chrome Extension today and experience the future of informed PR pitching.
